content: दीपन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [दीप् णिच् ल्युट् वा] {@--1@} Kindling, inflaming, &c. {@--2@} Digestive, tonic. {@--3@} Exciting, animating, stimulating; <ls>Māl. 9. 46.</ls> --नं {@--1@} Kindling, inflaming. {@--2@} A tonic stimulating digestion. {@--3@} Exciting, stimulating. {@--4@} Lighting, illuminating. {@--5@} Promoting digestion. {@--6@} Saffron.
